EmployeeDevelopmentSum.name: EmployeeDevelopmentSum
EmployeeDevelopmentSum.description: Represents statistics about training and development provided to upskill the employees.

AverageTrainingTime.description: The average training time that the employees have undertaken based on the gender or employee category.

BusinessFunction.description: Specifies the business function of the employee.

Description.description: The description of the employee development statistics.

DisclsReportingPeriodId.description: The reporting period for which the employee development statistics are generated.

EmployeeCount.description: The total number of employees who attended the program based on the gender and employee category.

EmployeePercentage.description: The percentage of employees who attended the program based on the gender and employee type.

EmployeeType.description: Specifies the type of employees who attended the employee development program.

Gender.description: Specifies the gender of employees who attended the employee development program.

IsBusinessFunctionAtRisk.description: Indicates whether business functions are at risk of corruption and bribery based on the company's tasks and responsibilities.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ManagementLevel.description: Specifies the management level of the employee.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PercentBusinessFunctionAtRisk.description: The percentage of business functions at risk that are covered by training programs.

ProgramCategory.description: Specifies the category of the employee development program.

SubsidiaryAccountId.description: The account that's identified as a subsidiary company.
